address: 123 Nguyen Hue Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
desc: Embark on your adventure with ease and comfort at our establishment, offering complimentary Wi-Fi throughout. Strategically located in District 1, you'll have convenient access to local attractions. Don't miss the chance to explore the iconic Ben Thanh Market. This esteemed 4-star venue provides guests with access to revitalizing massages, exquisite dining, and a state-of-the-art fitness center.
name: Sofitel Grand Plaza
title: Sofitel Grand Plaza
